title: Carlos Ghosn’s Lawyers Detail Theory of Why Nissan Ex-Chairman Was Targeted
text:
TOKYO—Carlos Ghosn’s lawyers asked a Tokyo court to throw out the criminal case against the former Nissan Motor Co. chairman, saying prosecutors brought it to help Nissan executives who feared a French takeover.

In a court filing, defense lawyers laid out for the first time in detail their theory of why Mr. Ghosn was targeted for prosecution. They said the Japanese government and Nissan teamed up to look for potential crimes by the French-educated executive to prevent him from pursuing plans to link Nissan more tightly to...
description: Defense lawyers asked a Tokyo court to throw out the criminal case against Carlos Ghosn, saying prosecutors brought it to help Nissan executives who feared a French takeover.
